title: Ironwood Club
content:
Ironwood Club Uncommon 1~4 Damage 1d4 Bludgeoning Ironwood Harmony: When under the effect of Shillelagh, gains an additional 1d4 Bludgeoning damage. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Fashioned from the hard, unforgiving trunk of an oak, this club still retains the perfume of the forest. Club Light 0.9 65

Ironwood Harmony: When under the effect of Shillelagh, gains an additional 1d4 Bludgeoning damage.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unloc
